monogr.title: In Search of the Precious Pearl: 5th Encounter of Monks from East and West (EMO V) at Dzaghgatzor Monastery (Valley of the Flowers) Armenia, Thursday 31 May – Thursday 7 June 2001

body.bibl: Vazheeparampil, Prasanna. “Monasticism in the Syro-Malabar Church: Lessons from the Past and Future Prospects.” In In Search of the Precious Pearl: 5th Encounter of Monks from East and West (EMO V) at Dzaghgatzor Monastery (Valley of the Flowers) Armenia, Thursday 31 May – Thursday 7 June 2001, edited by Edward G. Farrugia, 179–94. Roma: Pontificio Istituto Orientale / Riano: Cittadella Ecumenica Taddeide, 2005.

Prasanna Vazheeparampil, Monasticism in the Syro-Malabar Church: Lessons from the Past and Future Prospects, in In Search of the Precious Pearl: 5th Encounter of Monks from East and West (EMO V) at Dzaghgatzor Monastery (Valley of the Flowers) Armenia, Thursday 31 May – Thursday 7 June 2001, ed. Edward G. Farrugia (Roma: Pontificio Istituto Orientale / Riano: Cittadella Ecumenica Taddeide, 2005), 179–94.
